ack.title: Acknowledgement
ack.p: This study is part of the DengueTools project funded by the European Union Seventh Framework Programme FP7/2007-2013 under grant agreement no. 282589. We thank Dr. Hélène Delatte from UMR “Peuplements Végétaux et Bio-agresseurs en Milieu Tropical”, La Réunion, France, for the raw data on duration of life for female vector, Aedes albopictus. We also thank Miguel San Sebastian at Umeå University for critical reading and suggesting improvements to this manuscript.
